## Table.Builder.getAboveLeftGroupHeaders() method

If principal cell is in a group, get all group headers that are in this group and above+lift of principal cell.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getAboveLeftGroupHeaders(kind: "row" | "column"): (principalCell: Cell.Builder) => Iterable<Cell.Builder>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  kind | "row" \| "column" |  |
